articles.title: Australian FM's Anti-DPRK Invectives Slammed
articles.content:
Australian FM's Anti-DPRK Invectives Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA Sunday as regards the anti-DPRK invectives made by the Australian foreign minister:
					 On June 19 the Australian foreign minister at a telephone interview dared hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, not content with slandering its just line and policy including the bolstering of nuclear deterrence for self-defence.
					
					 Great irony is that although she is the foreign minister of a country, she unhesitatingly let loose a spate of reckless remarks slandering the other country and interfering in its internal affairs, not properly understanding even the elementary principle of the UN Charter and the essence of the regional peace and security.
					
					 Anyone of reason recognizes the stark reality that the threat to the peace and security in the Korean peninsula and in the region is being posed by the U.S. which has ceaselessly staged in collusion with the south Korean puppet forces joint military exercises chiefly aimed to "occupy Pyongyang" with huge armed forces for aggression and lethal weapons involved. 
					
					 Stunning is that the Australian foreign minister dared hurt the dignity of the DPRK's supreme leadership while talking about what she called legitimacy. 
					
					 She is not entitled to call for legitimacy as she is no more than a stooge carrying out the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and echoing others' sophism without his own foreign policy and view.
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon but resolutely punish anyone who dares slander the dignity of its supreme leadership.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Feats
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Feats 
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il published his famous work "Let Us Strengthen Our Party into the Eternal Party of Comrade Kim Il Sung" on June 20, Juche 53 (1964).
					 The work clarifies the idea of accomplishing the cause of President Kim Il Sung under the uplifted red flag of the party fully reflecting his revolutionary activities, the idea of creditably discharging the duty as his revolutionary soldiers and the idea of properly adhering to the main line in party work and activities.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article refers to the feats Kim Jong Il performed in strengthening the WPK into the party of the leader.
					
					 The revolutionary idea of the President was formulated as Kimilsungism and the cause of modeling the revolutionary ranks on the monolithic idea has been successfully accomplished thanks to the outstanding ideological and theoretical wisdom of Kim Jong Il and his extraordinary leadership, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 He trained all the party members into the staunch revolutionaries who are armed with the revolutionary idea of the leader, unconditionally and thoroughly implement the line and policies of the party, its embodiment.
					
					 He clarified the idea of the absolute position and decisive role of the leader and made sure that loyalty to the leader is regarded as faith, conscience, morality and part of one's life. Thanks to his wise leadership, all members of the WPK united close around the leader in thinking and purpose, morality and sense of obligation.
					
					 The WPK witnessed the firm establishment of the revolutionary discipline whereby the policy issues were handled according to the conclusion of the Party Central Committee, the control and guidance system for enhancing the function and role of the party organizations and such revolutionary work method as going among masses and relying on them.
					
					 The article calls for glorifying the WPK into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Raps Park Geun Hye' Outpourings Inciting Confrontation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Raps Park Geun Hye's Outpourings Inciting Confrontation
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye in a recent memorial address talked such nonsense as "peace is far off" and "there should be a strong counter-measure" while clamoring about the "north's nuclear development and threat of provocations," instead of reflecting on her crimes.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Sunday says in an article that what Park uttered disclosed her ulterior intention to incite hostility towards the fellow countrymen in the north in the south Korean society in a bid to divert elsewhere the public attention and stand in confrontation with the DPRK to the last. 
					
					 She veiled her inveterate idea of seeking the confrontation of the social systems with the high-sounding word of "confidence," putting her predecessors into the shade in her crafty and vicious nature, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 "Initiative for Northeast Asian peace and cooperation" seeking cooperation in the moves to stifle the DPRK and the "Dresden declaration" fanning up inter-Korean confrontation are nothing but their by-products.
					
					 It is nonsensical for the south Korean authorities to talk about "confidence" while persistently sidestepping the issue of defusing the political and military stand-off, the most urgent matter arising in the north-south relations.
					
					 Their gibberish pursuing the confrontation of the social systems under the pretexts of the "north's nukes" and "human rights issue in the north" goes to prove how they are preoccupied with the scenario to invade the north, utterly indifferent to mending the inter-Korean relations and achieving peaceful reunification.
					
					 The prevailing situation clearly indicates that the  Park Geun Hye group comprises the most untrustworthy guys among the Koreans and no matter how frequently one sits at the negotiating table with these confrontation maniacs, it will only bring greater disappointment to  the public at home and abroad desirous of detente and peaceful reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The Korean nation will never show leniency to those traitors who go frantic with the anti-DPRK conspiratorial plots and provocations, going against the trend of the nation towards the independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: State Merited Chorus Gives Performances in North Phyongan Province
articles.content:
State Merited Chorus Gives Performances in North Phyongan Province
 Sinuiju, June 22 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus made its performance tour of Kusong and Sinuiju cities of North Phyongan Province from June 16 to 22. It gave 13 performances during the period.
					 Among the audience were officials and workers in the field of machine-building industry in the province, officials and other people, youth and students in the province, cities and counties, tens of thousands of people in all.
					
					 Theatres were crowded with the audience every day as people made even long trips to watch performances. Performances evoked lively response among the audience.
					
					 They described the performances as the ones greatly encouraging the ranks dynamically advancing toward the final victory, and the exciting ones inspiring the people of North Phyongan Province with sky-high spirit and militant enthusiasm of the revolutionary army.
					
					 Workers in the field of machine-building industry in Kusong, those of the Rakwon Machine Complex and the Suphung Power Station, and agricultural workers of the Sinam Cooperative Farm in Ryongchon County and the Unhung Cooperative Farm in Thaechon County renewed their firm determination to kindle the torch for increased production at each work site to the tune of the revolutionary army songs.

articles.title: Teachers' Union Declares All-out Action against S. Korean Regime's Suppression
articles.content:
Teachers' Union Declares All-out Action against S. Korean Regime's Suppression
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Teachers' Union held a emergency meeting on June 19 at which it declared an all-out action against the authorities' suppression of it.
					 The organization condemned the Seoul administrative court for making a decision to outlaw the Teachers' Union on the same day and the Ministry of Education for taking such follow-up steps as pressurizing the full-time officials of the union to return to their former jobs and informing it of the suspension of negotiations.
					
					 It warned the authorities that it would launch an all-out action including a protest visit to Chongwadae, a large-scale meeting and activities to enlist solidarity from international bodies.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Foreign organizations posted articles on their websites on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. 
					 Progressive bodies of Britain including the Britain-DPRK Friendship Association posted such articles as an article titled "Let us dynamically wage movement for independent reunification under the unfurled banner of the June 15 joint declaration" illustrated with photos of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The article said the June 15 joint declaration is a programme for reunification which the Korean nation should hold high in the new century. 
					
					 The world progressives desirous of Korea's reunification should unite and fully support the Korean people in their struggle to put an end to the U.S. and south Korean authorities' anti-reunification and confrontation policy. 
					
					 The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK in an article titled "For Korea's independent reunification and peace and prosperity" said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il saw to it that the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, a landmark for Korea's reunification, and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it,  were adopted, thus performing exploits to go down in the history of the movement for Korea's reunification. 
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address called for ushering in a new phase for independent reunification, peace and prosperity this year. 
					
					 The future of the Korean nation is very bright and rosy as it is led by Kim Jong Un, lodestar of Korea's reunification. 
					
					 The MS Travel Agency of Germany in an article titled "By Our Nation Itself" introduced the idea of By Our Nation Itself, the basic spirit of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. Preserving and implementing the idea guarantees reunification and co-prosperity of the Korean nation and peace and stability of the world, the article added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Nigeria 
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Our Socialism Centred on the Masses Shall Not Perish" was brought out in booklet by the N. K. Publishing House in Enugu, Nigeria.
					 The work published on May 5, Juche 80 (1991) clarifies the sure victory of socialism, solidity of Korean socialism, secret of its indestructibility and essential nature.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Nigerian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Nigerian Figure
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- It is our great honor to release leader Kim Jong Il's work on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The managing director of the N. K. Publishing House of Nigeria said this at a book-releasing ceremony held on June 13.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into a genuine mother party which serves the people.
					
					 He made sure that all officials regard it an important principle governing the method of party work to go among the people, lend ears to their voices and settle in time all matters arising in their life.
					
					 He also saw to it that when working out a line and policy and implementing them, they fully reflected the people's will and wishes and their interests were not infringed upon under any circumstances.

articles.title: Short Biography of Kim Jong Il Introduced in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Short Biography of Kim Jong Il Introduced in Bulgaria 
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association carried in its special bulletin the short biography of leader Kim Jong Il on June 17.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Tanzania
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Tanzania
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- A Tanzanian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Dar Es Salaam on June 13. 
					 The secretary general of the Tanzania-DPRK Friendship Association was elected chairman of the remembrance committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad 
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Diverse events took place in different countries to celebrate the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 They included meetings, round-table talks and book, photo and fine art exhibitions held in Britain, Italy, Germany, Czech Republic and Thailand in the period from June 10 to 16. 
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting exploits Kim Jong Il performed in building and leading the party.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books, photos and fine art pieces introducing the true picture of Songun Korea. 
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) said the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a powerful state because Kim Jong Il led the party work aiming at implementing the line of the Songun revolution. 
					
					 The general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy said that the great exploits Kim Jong Il performed by victoriously leading the Korean people in the struggle to defend socialism and build a thriving nation in the most difficult period of the Korean revolution will be conveyed to posterity. 
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said thanks to Kim Jong Il the DPRK firmly defended socialism from the moves of the imperialists and served as a beacon of hope for progressive mankind. 
					
					 The chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand said Kim Jong Il developed and enriched the Juche idea and declared the programme for modeling the whole of society on Kimilsungism and turned the WPK into a powerful party.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded in Indonesia 
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Indonesia to celebrate the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They included seminars on his exploits held by the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle and a machine technology company and round-table talks by the Diversity Party of Indonesia and a company and a film show by the Adita Ariya Prawira Ship Co. in the period from June 9 to 11. 
					
					 The section chief for foreign relations of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle said Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into an invincible and iron-willed party by carrying forward the idea of President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the WPK, on the party building   and his exploits performed in it.
					
					 The manager of the machine technology company said the WPK has become an ideologically pure entity, an integral organization and the party which achieved the unity of actions in which the leadership system of the leader has been thoroughly established thanks to Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The secretary general of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia said Kim Jong Il was the great man who defended Korean-style socialism and put the dignity of the country on the highest level with his unique political caliber and outstanding leadership. 
					
					 An official of the Indonesian company said Kim Jong Il was the great thinker and theoretician and the greatest man recognized by the world.
